name: Across the Sky (Daniel Jones)
description:
Prologue

This project is a simple prototype ‘prologue’ level that demonstrates some of the core mechanics and combat. For the purpose of this prototype the game follows a simple story, but the main game is not planned to include any set story, instead opting to give the player the tools to explore and interact freely to create their own unique experience.

In this early stage any feedback would be greatly appreciated.
